EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Version 6.2.1 ePCR Release Preview - Cardiac Monitor Interface
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> COMPLIMENTARY LIVE WEBINAR: Version 6.2.1 ePCR Release Preview - Cardiac Monitor Interface
Populate Patient Care Reports with data Captured by the Phillips and Physio Cardiac Monitors
Your cardiac monitor has valuable information - why ask the Caregiver to enter that data into the Patient Care Report (PCR)? TriTech's ePCR can utilize your Phillips or Physio Cardiac Monitor data to populate the PCR, thereby reducing the time to fill out - and increasing the accuracy of - the report.
Learn More - Register for a Complimentary Live Webinar on:
Thursday, June 7 2:00PM ET l 1:00PM CT l Noon MT l 11:00AM PT
Please copy and paste the following URL into any web browser: http://offers.tritech.com/June7Webinar.html
